ContentType.name: Form
ContentType.Description: Form is a special List type. You can place a Form portlet on a page to show this form. Form submissions are sent out in an e-mail, and also stored in the Sense/Net Content Repository.

Field.name: DisplayName
Field.Description: This is the title of the form

Field.name: TitleSubmitter
Field.Description: This is the title of the submitter mail

Field.name: Description
Field.Description: Please give a short description of this form

Field.name: AfterSubmitText
Field.Description: This is the text displayed after the form is submitted

Field.name: EmailList
Field.Description: The list of email addresses to where a notification message containing submitted values are sent after submitting the form. The addresses should be separated by ";" or ",".

Field.name: EmailFrom
Field.Description: This address is displayed in the "From" field of the notification email. Default is "mailerservice@example.com"

Field.name: EmailFromSubmitter
Field.Description: This address is displayed in the "From" field of the user notification email. Default is "mailerservice@example.com"

Field.name: EmailField
Field.Description: The name of the field specified among ContentList fields containing the submitter's email address. Ie.: "#Email" or "#SubmitterEmail"

Field.name: EmailTemplate
Field.Description: The template of the email message sent to the administrators. By default the template of notification email sent to the submitter is the same as the one sent to the recipients given in the email list above. Form contents can be inserted with the "{0}" string.

Field.name: EmailTemplateSubmitter
Field.Description: The template of the email message sent to the submitter. By default the template of notification email sent to the submitter is the same as the one sent to the recipients given in the email list above. Form contents can be inserted with the "{0}" string.
